description: This file defines the ArxivKnowledgeBase class, which manages a collection of documents retrieved from arXiv using a reader. It provides both synchronous and asynchronous methods to iterate over document lists based on queries.

classes.name: ArxivKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that extends AgentKnowledge to fetch and iterate over documents from arXiv based on queries, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous generator property that yields lists of Document objects for each query.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator property that yields lists of Document objects for each query.
